User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account within the FaustApp application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account.

passwordHash.description: Hashed password for authentication. (Note: actual password storage is handled externally)

registrationCode.description: Registration code used during account creation.

emailVerified.description: Indicates whether the user's email address has been verified.

MemberProfile.title: MemberProfile
MemberProfile.description: Represents the profile information of a member, extending the base user information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the member profile.

location.description: Location or address of the member.

position.description: Playing position of the member (e.g., Abwehr, Spiel, Angriff).

gender.description: Gender of the member (e.g., male, female, diverse).

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user authentication and registration data. Accessible only by the authenticated user (path-based ownership).

/member_profiles/{memberProfileId}.description: Stores member profile data, separate from authentication information. All members can be listed, but editing is restricted.
